name: Toy Patrol: 3rd person shooter. Tiny commando with machine gun shoots stupid zombies
name_original: Toy Patrol: 3rd person shooter. Tiny commando with machine gun shoots stupid zombies
description:
Intense monster-killing action! 3rd person-view shooter! Hell of a slaughter!

- Upgrade your weapon, give the monsters some heat!
- Different mission types: Survive, Gather the trophies and Kill Them All!
- Help your friends, play together!


***** Commentaries: *****

Daniel (Chicago, USA): Killed all the zombies, already waiting for the new bosses!

Art (Toronto, Canada): Great game! Download asap!


***** Important: *****

- Free Gems and Money
- Incredible graphics and music
- Best time killer ever
